div.p: Published by: U.S. Office of the National Coordinator (ONC)
This profile defines the expected capabilities of the DAF Requestor actor when conforming to the DAF FHIR implementation guide.
The DAF Requestor SHALL support accessing at least one FHIR resource using:

ul.li: Appropriate DAF profile(s) for the resource being accessed.
Appropriate RESTful operations documented for each DAF profile.
Appropriate Search parameters listed for each DAF profile.

div.p: In addition to the above, DAF Requestors MAY use Modifiers, Composite Search Parameters as part of the search request.
The DAF Requestor SHALL implement REST behavior according to the FHIR specification. The DAF Requestor SHALL use either json or xml resource formats for all DAF interactions.
Implementations must meet the security requirements documented in the DAF implementation guide.

publisher.value: U.S. Office of the National Coordinator (ONC)

description.value: This profile defines the expected capabilities of the DAF Responder actor when conforming to the DAF FHIR implementation guide.

documentation.value: The DAF Requestor SHALL support querying of one or more FHIR resources using appropriate DAF profile(s), RESTful operations defined for the profile, Search parameters identified for the profile.

description.value: Implementations SHALL meet the security requirements documented in the [[daf-security|DAF implementation guide]].

documentation.value: Allows discovery of existing DAFPatient resources using different search criteria
Allows retrieval of a specific DAFPatients by id
Allows review of changes to DAFPatient instance over time
Allows retrieval of a historical version of a DAFPatient instance
Allows discovery of existing DAFAllergyIntolerance resources using different search criteria
Allows retrieval of a specific DAFAllergyIntolerance by id
Allows review of changes to DAFAllergyIntolerance instance over time
